title: The history of the reigns of Henry the Seventh, Henry the Eighth, Edward the Sixth, and Queen Mary the first written by the Right Honourable Francis Lord Verulam, Viscount St. Alban ; the other three by the Right Honourable and Right Reverend Father in God, Francis Godwyn, Lord Bishop of Hereford.
author: Bacon, Francis, 1561-1626.
publisher: Printed by W.G. for R. Scot, T. Basset, J. Wright, R. Chiswell, and J. Edwyn,
